metadata.key_specifications: Low forward voltage; Low capacitance; Forward current: 500 mA; Reverse voltage: 40 V; Forward voltage (IF = 500 mA): 550 mV; AEC-Q101 qualified
metadata.applications: Ultra high-speed switching; Line termination; Voltage clamping; Reverse polarity protection

page_summaries.content:
1. General description
Planar Schottky barrier diode with an integrated guard ring for stress protection, encapsulated in a very small SOT323 (SC-70) Surface-Mounted Device (SMD) plastic package.

2. Features and benefits
• Low forward voltage
• Low capacitance
• AEC-Q101 qualified

3. Applications
• Ultra high-speed switching
• Line termination
• Voltage clamping
• Reverse polarity protection

4. Quick reference data

Product Summary.content: Planar Schottky barrier diode with an integrated guard ring for stress protection, encapsulated in a very small SOT323 (SC-70) Surface-Mounted Device (SMD) plastic package. Low forward voltage, low capacitance, and AEC-Q101 qualified for ultra high-speed switching, line termination, voltage clamping, and reverse polarity protection applications.

Quick reference data: forward current up to 500 mA, reverse voltage up to 40 V, forward voltage typically 550 mV at 500 mA and 25 °C ambient temperature. Sections updated include general description, features and benefits, applications, quick reference data, ordering information, marking, limiting values (with added ambient temperature), thermal characteristics, and characteristics.
The datasheet provides pinning information, test information, package outline details, and soldering guidelines for the Schottky barrier diode.
